name: Deadly Night - No Escape
description:
You recently started living in a house in a forest with only one neighbor and a fire lookout tower. Strange things are happening and you must react quickly before you start going insane or die. Find your way to survival while facing your fears.

Key features

  • Massive Open-World Size.
  • Many Random Events Awaits.
  • Everything Around You Might Be A Threat.
  • Your Tutorial Is Also Your Gear Up Level, Forget Something And You Will Never Be Able To Replace It.
  • This Game Is The Perfect Example Of "You Can Run But You Can't Hide".
